channel.title: I don't know what to do with my economy
channel.description:
Well, I'm using an Allstar-Scape base and the economy was bad. I made an attempt to fix it, but people got rares from no where and everything. I don't want to continue running the economy boster, so should I just let my economy go?
Thanks.

item.title: I don't know what to do with my economy
item.dc:creator: @X_Screech_X X Screech X
item.description:
@X_Screech_X wrote:

ILol, I’m using antoher Base, so I guess they can lock this…

Read full topic
item.source: I don't know what to do with my economy

item.title: I don't know what to do with my economy
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I have mine set up so that theres a 5 second delay before you logout when you click the logout button. That gives plenty of time for them to die… muhahahah

item.title: I don't know what to do with my economy

item.description:

try to set a timer so when they hit 0 hp they die straight away, no death emote.

item.description:

The are… to people go to the wild. One with a rare for instance. His friend kills him and gets the rare. The guy to have the first rare logs out really fast and he has the item due to a roll back.
